### Occupant satisfaction

```{r satisfaction}
#| echo: false
#| fig-width: 10
#| fig-height: 1.25
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-dpi: 500

satisfaction_levels <- c("-3", "-2", "-1", "0", "+1", "+2", "+3")
satisfaction_labels <- c("Very\nDissatisfied", "Dissatisfied", "Somewhat\nDissatisfied", "Neither",  "Somewhat\nSatisfied", "Satisfied", "Very\nSatisfied")
satisfaction_palette <- c("#ba3b50", "#cf6b61", "#d09da9", '#f3e8e7', "#c2e8bb", "#8bcc8a", "#4cb15e")

df <- data.frame(
  level = factor(satisfaction_levels, levels = satisfaction_levels),
  label = satisfaction_labels,
  color = satisfaction_palette,
  x = seq_along(satisfaction_levels),
  y = 1
)

palette_strip_plot(df)

```

### Thermal sensation

```{r thermal_sensation}

#| fig-width: 10
#| fig-height: 1.25
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-dpi: 500

thermal_sensation_labels <- c("Cold", "Cool", "Slightly cool", "Neutral", "Slightly warm", "Warm", "Hot")
thermal_sensation_palette <- c("#6b8dd6", "#82c6ed","#b8e4f7","#c9e0b0","#f7a9b7","#eb6b58","#b44a4a")

df <- data.frame(
  level = factor(thermal_sensation_levels, levels = thermal_sensation_levels),
  label = thermal_sensation_labels,
  color = thermal_sensation_palette,
  x = seq_along(thermal_sensation_levels),
  y = 1
)

palette_strip_plot(df)

```

### Thermal acceptability

```{r thermal_acceptability}
#| echo: false
#| fig-width: 10
#| fig-height: 1.25
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-dpi: 500

thermal_acceptability_levels <- c("-2", "-1", "0", "+1", "+2")
thermal_acceptability_labels <- c("Very unacceptable", "Somewhat unacceptable", "Neither nor", "Somewhat acceptable", "Very acceptable")
thermal_acceptability_palette <- c('#bc3e4d','#d99fa8','#f3e8e7','#c1e0b9','#38a257')

df <- data.frame(
  level = factor(thermal_acceptability_levels, levels = thermal_acceptability_levels),
  label = thermal_acceptability_labels,
  color = thermal_acceptability_palette,
  x = seq_along(thermal_acceptability_levels),
  y = 1
)

palette_strip_plot(df)

```
